text:
1. On windows 98, classpath, Java_home etc. can't be saved and they should be set each time.
2. MS-DOS window reports 'Out of Environment Space' error message and does not load.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
nacho@apache.org
text:
1. Modify your win98 autoexec.bat to cretae the needed classpath enviroment vars
2. You need to start a command.com with a expanded environment 
command.com /e:4096 i.e 

Fixed in tomcat 3.3 ( classpath is very short now )
